# body

**Instance Property**

The content and behavior of the scene’s interface.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency var body: Self.Body { get }
```

## Discussion

For the body of your scene, specify a [doc://com.apple.extensionkit/documentation/ExtensionKit/PrimitiveAppExtensionScene] structure with the contents you want to display. You can also use that structure to configure an XPC connection for handling any interface-related data exchanges.

## Configuring the app extension

- **Body**: The type for this scene’s body.
